Oscl_File::OsclCacheObserver Class Reference

#include <oscl_file_io.h>


Public Methods

virtual ~OsclCacheObserver ()

Detailed Description

For defining a cache observer. Cache observer can implement customized cache schemes by replacing the SetCachePosition routine.
